page.title: 20LIMBURY---CREDITS
page.content:
Our square covered not only Limbury, but parts of Leagrave and Marsh Farm. Five Springs is the name given to some blocks of flats built where the River Lea starts.Close by is Waulud's Bank,a prehistoric camp and burial mounds,of which two have been excavated.Also nearby is the shopping centre at Marsh Road,which has 3 Banks,2 Supermarkets, 2 Restaurants,a cafe,a D.I.Y shop,car sales,estate agent,a discount electric store and much more. ******************************* Contibuting Schools:
Junior Schools High Schools
Beechwood Road Challney Boys Maidenhall Challney Girls
